byline.original: By DAVID W. CHEN and KATE TAYLOR

snippet: The mayor took the stand at the trial of John F. Haggerty Jr. to do what he usually seeks to avoid: explain how he managed and financed his $110 million campaign for a third term in office.
lead_paragraph: The mayor took the stand at the trial of John F. Haggerty Jr. to do what he usually seeks to avoid: explain how he managed and financed his $110 million campaign for a third term in office.

headline.main: Mayor, Not Recalling Much, Testifies in Consultant’s Trial
headline.print_headline: Mayor, Not Recalling Much, Testifies in Consultant’s Trial
headline.seo: Bloomberg Testifies at Trial of John F. Haggerty Jr.
